alert.note: Alert for Naranjito (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued February 04 at 3:43PM AST until February 04 at 6:30PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Naranjito in Puerto Rico... * Until 630 PM AST. * At 337 PM AST, River sensors along Guadiana`s River and emergency managers are indicating flooding due to previous rains across the warned area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...River sensors and emergency manager reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * The following roads are flooded: PR 825 near William Pizza Bridge, PR-#5 interior near Bull Bridge, Sector Obras Publicas PR-164. A mudslide was reported near Camino Tono Gonzalez. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
